website_summaries.verdict: One of the better budget TV antennas that comes with a decent satellite service without extra cost.
pros: Setting up the TV antenna takes little time since a single coax connection using the included coax cable is required
The satellite feature is self-aligning and uses a pay-as-you-go plan that doesn't kick in when not in use
cons: Standard TV reception is spotty in areas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Made a mount out of a toliet flange, a nylon cutting board and some PVC pipe
customer_reviews.author: bigsquat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hookup!
customer_reviews.text: This was an extreamly easy hookup. We had a spare dish receiver from where we unhooked a TV upstairs that we weren’t using. We did not opt for the RV package, but are very happy with the results. All of ‘our’ channels on the road, in less than 5 minutes. Our only complaint is the length of cable (included) is usually not long enough to get signal, as we are mostly in wooded areas when camping. An ‘on the go’ system should include 50-75 feet of cable so that you can get the satellite reception anywhere needed. We spent an additional $30 for a longer cable.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this item
customer_reviews.text: Unacceptable quality issues. I purchased 2 of these and both have the same problem other users have reported. They are next to impossible to lock on to a sat signal. The unit sits there and continuously clicks as if the plastic gears are grinding inside. For the price and the name, Winegard and Dish should be ashamed of putting this product on the market. These need to be pulled from the market as defective and discontinued. Don't waste your time or money on this poor item.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Melchor

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and works great
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Dish on my 2005 Fleetwood Discovery motorhome, and it was amazingly easy to install on the roof using the mounting hardware ordered separate. The product works great, it does bring in the HD channels and finds the satellite automatically. One thing to keep in mind if replacing an existing satellite dish, the power to operate the PL-7000 dish is through the coax cable and requires no separate power line to connect. As Dish uses several satellites, one feature that I do especially like is when you change channels the dish will find the correct satellite in just a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Sir John Esq

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: After 30 days it starts grinding looking for satellite it is annoying and frightening if you are near it. I had the same problem with a previous one but it did it immediately and I bought another and shipped it back. Very upsetting that this is supposed to be latest and greatest and does this as well as loses signal often. I have a king which rarely loses signal and is very quiet. Guess I should have bought 2 of those. I wanted to have 2 separate TVs to be able to watch whatever they want to watch
customer_reviews.author: reading wearily

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Little noisey when it first fires up. Very rattle sounding when you shake it. No work to it at all. Unpack it, connect it to your compatable portable dish receiver, tell receiver what state your in, as long as you have a clear line of sight, you will be watching tv in minutes. Bought a refurbished 211 receiver from dish rv site for $49. Bucks, happy with system and purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast to setup but not very good in bad wether
customer_reviews.text: Fast to setup but not very good in bad wether...constantly cutting out and searching again which takes another 10mins
customer_reviews.author: U St

customer_reviews.title: Works with 211Z
customer_reviews.text: I have satellite dish on my motor home. KVH told me to buy the 211Z receiver which would work with their dish. I bought it and worked for several hours trying to get it to work. I was able to activate the receiver by placing it on my home dish system, but it would not work with the dish in the motor home. I decided to buy the playmaker. I connected it, turned on the TV and it worked without any setup at all. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Geek

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk 3 times around.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product through Amazon in August of 2019. This unit is not for our primary TV, so it's not used much. On average it's used twice every 2 weeks. Yesterday tried to use the TV that this unit is attached to and could not aquire a signal. You could hear the plastic gears grind. So loud, you could hear it 30 feet away. So it quit working. This was the 3rd unit we tried of this model and the previous 2 failed the same way within time to return to seller. Now we just have junk. Will look for something else before I replace this with another piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this seems to be a far superior antenna than the king tailgater which only lasted me ...
customer_reviews.text: this seems to be a far superior antenna than the king tailgater which only lasted me 10 months.bought the tailgater new last may and already quit working.didn't realize till after I had bought it that it was no longer available out of production
customer_reviews.author: Burton M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in RV with an existing Dish receiver that I know works and is compatible with the Playmaker. Spent 3 hours trying to get to work and spent 3 calls with DIsh Tech with no answers. Will connect but looses signal after about 5 minutes and will not reconnect. Friend had a Traveler portable so connected it to my receiver and works fine. Retried mine and had same no signal results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for a tailgate and had it set up per instructions. It worked for 1 hour then stopped working and I never got a signal back. All the people with Direct TV satellites had no problem watching the game so we watched it with them. DO NOT WASTE YOU MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great RV dish, does what it should especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy instal. I was surprised how quite the unit was. My old wingaurd was super loud and slow. Shiping was quick and reliable. So far this is everything I wanted for under $250. The dome does feel a little cheaply made. Harder plastic would be better. Overall I’m happy. I will update in a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 3 months before it stopped working. You can hear the gears grinding inside the dome. Was only used for 3 days in the back yard, never made it to the camp ground. The older one with the power cable works great have it on my camper, but this newer one is pure junk! Now I have to buy another one for my 5th wheel, what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use at the lake as our roof top unit was installed in a poor location on the roof by the RV dealer. This unit is portable and can be placed where it can function properly! I hooked up cable to Wally and watched my favorite channels instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Sedlak

customer_reviews.title: Really good for an RV
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for our RV, and it works fairly well. We had to call DISH network to activate our Wally receiver and local programming. After that hassle, the portable dish has held up its job really well!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Wald

customer_reviews.title: TV on the Road
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, works fine. The use of this with the Wally works just don't expect too much. If you ttravel often in an RV this makes it easy to watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: PGA

customer_reviews.title: Replaced an Tailgater and this is a lot better set up
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an Tailgater and this is a lot better set up. I just set it out and it searches, no longer have to point in the right direction and I can mount this on the RV roof when I'm ready.
customer_reviews.author: Troy V

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Not bad when its n8ce and summy.Hit or miss on cloudy days. Also need to keep power to antenna constantly to avoid set up da8ly.
customer_reviews.author: PapaP

customer_reviews.title: So far i like it. It was easy to set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far i like it. It was easy to set up and plug right in and turn TV and Receiver on and it did the rest set up by itself. we will see.
customer_reviews.author: David Tibbitt

customer_reviews.title: Has never worked.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to us June 5th, 2020. The Playmaker/Wally has worked one time. In our driveway. Have taken it camping four times and it has never worked. Spent several hours, total, on phone with Dish tech people. Never able to get Dish programming. Tested the Wally at home today, connected to our Installed dish and did not work. Too late to return Amazon but Dish may lose a customer. JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS RAINEY

customer_reviews.title: Must have a completely clear view
customer_reviews.text: You have to have a completely clear view of the sky. Also every time I turn receiver on I have to go through the check switch and set up. I haven't been completely satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Freddie t

customer_reviews.title: Dish network antenna
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, this is far and away the best way to get satellite service. We had a manual aiming dish and it worked IF you could get it aimed. This item is fully automatic. No comparison.
customer_reviews.author: R. PetersenTop Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: never worked. spent four days trying to get a signal. No obstructions and mounted on roof of rv. their response was to run a coax through a window. this is a new rv. Waste of money and holes in roof.
customer_reviews.author: Rancher1405

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm even in the rain. I made it level hooked up the cable and it did the rest. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Love this Playmaker,
customer_reviews.text: Love this. If you order this MAKE sure you get the Walley and the stand at the same time. I didn’t and had to order the receiver and stand separate. Dish network customer service is great too in setting it up
customer_reviews.author: nancy bailey

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once. Hooked it up and probably took it 5 minutes to find satellite and it was done. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: epi

customer_reviews.title: Received
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for... havent tried it out yet but will this coming weekend and will update if it's not what we expected
customer_reviews.author: Samantha E.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Misleading
customer_reviews.text: While the dish met my expectations, the initial ad on Amazon was misleading. The way I read the ad was for the dish and the receiver. When I received just the dish, I was surprised the receiver was not included. Reading the receipt, it was just the dish. Delayed getting my set up which was frustrating as I'm in an area where there is no local tv.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth time or money.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second device, the first was defective. This one is not any better. It makes a grating sound searching for a signal when it's a clear day with no trees. Total crap. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Vierzba

customer_reviews.title: Realy good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I was using the original dish 10002,it took sometimes half hour to 45 minutes to set up. This unit just plugs in the RV. And finds the satellite.
customer_reviews.author: romeo girba

customer_reviews.title: Definitely improved...
customer_reviews.text: Way better than my original "tailgater" which the wind finally destroyed...it won't blow over, no need to point, it's quieter, acquires signal faster, and it can be securely attached.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Seems to need the perfect spot for reception.
customer_reviews.text: We had to move this around to several different areas before it finally started working. Even after we cut down trees in the area we still had to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Leckwart

customer_reviews.title: Sadly this has a problem...
customer_reviews.text: 1 star for fast shipping, used 3-4 times and then it would not find a satellite. Turned off multiple times and it still could not locate satellites Had a wide open view of the southern sky. Sounded like the gears were grinding, Returning to Amazon for a replacement hopefully it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hunt Camp
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hunt camp. In retrospect I wish I had purchased the model that recieves Eastern and Western Arc satellites. Some local channels are not available in HD on Western Arc
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Great black Friday price as well.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Fun to be out in the middle of the desert and watch the Gonzaga basketball tournaments!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Winegard PL 70000 TV antenna
customer_reviews.text: Mounted it on the tripod hooked up the coax turned every thing on followed the on screen setup and was watching TV in ten minutes. very easy setup great picture very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Deborah k Christman

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as it was suppossed to. Made a heck of a grinding noise, like the gears were stripping. Talked with tech and he said that was normal?!? Did not pick up satellites as well as my old dish so i bought a tailgator dish and it works perfect. This was junk. Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dave L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: No more spending all day looking for the satellite, would recommend it to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Corbin

customer_reviews.title: It took a while to locate the satellites but I am really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received last week, hooked it up Saturday. It took a while to locate the satellites but I am really happy with it. Everything is pretty much automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if we'll keep it.
customer_reviews.text: Has started making loud grinding noises. Haven't decided to return yet.
customer_reviews.author: BUNNY3107

customer_reviews.title: Provides HD programming in a compact package.
customer_reviews.text: Solved my satellite issues for my RV and connected first time providing HD programming.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Simple and a better product than the last one we had.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Evans

customer_reviews.title: Mounted on a truck camper
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mounted on my 1191 lance truck camper for about 9 months. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan944

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Light weight so it is easy to carry around,, setup and activation is much easier then my old antenna. I rated it a three star due to failing a week after installing. Amazon was great AND prompt about replacing it. The replacement has been operating fine thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tate

customer_reviews.title: Beware.....
customer_reviews.text: Looses signal and starts grinding for a couple minutes and it's a very loud grinding. Will randomly grind at all hours of the day. Winegard customer service is horrible. They will try to find everything wrong except for their product. Gonna have to cut my loss here and maybe use it as some sort of lawn ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Small, portable, easy to use and set up. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Evans

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one it came broken, second one did not work...
customer_reviews.author: Rick Olson

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: For the one time I used it, it works well. Time will tell
customer_reviews.author: jae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to watch tv when on the go and no cable is available.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Very easy installation. I have had several of these. Just wish they would last longer than a year
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Playmaker is terrific
customer_reviews.text: I am 83 years old and can no longer climb up to the top of my RV. The playmaker is easy to program and finds the satellite right away. The picture is High Definition and is real clear even on my old fashion TV. Thumbs Up. Dwight Brown
customer_reviews.author: Dwight A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: The playmaker works great, but there is no where to place a lock for security.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Greg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Works great we used it for the first time last week.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I have two. One mounted and the other incase of a tree!
customer_reviews.author: Boyle's foreign Car

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased used for half price!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great arrived in 5 days!! Looks brand new. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: good working little sat
customer_reviews.text: good working little sat. dishs and it has a lot better deal them Dierect had so I switched from Dierect to Dish
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pairs well with a Wally.
customer_reviews.text: Quieter, works well with our Wally and better picture quality. Better than our last Playmaker which lasted 2 years and which my installer called “ a piece of junk”

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Picks up both satellites 119 and 110 so you can get all your channels. I put it on my RV

customer_reviews.title: Only last a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had it just over a year and it stopped working. Have tried everything. It just quit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great, easy install and a good value would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup works great I was not happy that my previous carryout could not be repaired when it stopped working

customer_reviews.title: Good Product! Easy to hookup!!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to hookup and it worked immediately!

customer_reviews.title: Playmaker
customer_reviews.text: I installed it on an RV. It was easy to install and set up. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: I called DISH to help update my Receiver and install software for the Antenna
customer_reviews.text: Can't say I dislike anything about it. So Far So Good

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Dish antenna for RV time I tried to use it the return time was over I will discontinu buying from Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It is crappy the signal keeps going away then tries for about an hour to find signal again

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: To be able to get dish anywhere I go in life.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money on this
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste money on this..we bought for our rv and after spending a lot of time on phone with Dish support still would not work...Olson Trading Post is refusing to let us return it
customer_reviews.author: alma lucas

customer_reviews.title: Problem finding satalite, takes to long. Faster just ...
customer_reviews.text: Problem finding satalite, takes to long. Faster just to set up dish system. Just place in a place with a clear view of southern sky. NOT!
customer_reviews.author: John Hayes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received this dish and it didn’t work. I returned it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Scarpinato, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Well.... as of now, can’t get it to work. Will try again in a different location
customer_reviews.author: travis w perry

customer_reviews.title: Luckily I had a tester and checked it and it was good. So their final answer was return it and ...
customer_reviews.text: I set it up and the playmaker couldn't connect to the satellite, so I called winegard technical support. They didn't seem very knowledgeable of their product. they had me try all different things and nothing would work. I had one tech tell me I needed to go buy a voltage tester and test the voltage from the vip211z box to the satellite. I said WHAT! Luckily I had a tester and checked it and it was good. So their final answer was return it and get a replacement. That was poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great except for in a rainstorm. It is a satellite after all!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

product_meta.title: Winegard White Company PL-7000 Dish Playmaker Portable Antenna
product_meta.description:
Style:Antenna OnlyWinegard PL-7000 DISH Playmaker RV Portable Satellite Antenna: 

The Winegard DISH Playmaker portable satellite antenna is specially designed for watching DISH HD programming while in the RV, camping, hunting, or make your tailgate party the ultimate tailgater! This easy to use portable satellite system automatically finds satellite programming with no antenna pointing.

New DISH Playmaker Satellite Antenna Features: - Larger high-strength military grade aluminum alloy reflector for maximum durability and improved signal strength
- Reliable, high-performance stepper motors provide speed and precision
- Optional RV roof mount kit - sold separately

Effortless Portable Satellite Setup: The DISH Playmaker is a fully automatic portable satellite antenna and is easy for anyone to set up in just a few minutes. Simply connect the included coax between the DISH Playmaker and the satellite receiver, then connect an HDMI or coax from the satellite receiver to the TV. Power up the satellite receiver and TV and complete the satellite receiver setup.

Pay-As-You-Go Satellite Programming: Compatible with your current DISH subscription or pay-as-you-go satellite programming providing convenience of no long contracts or commitments.

Tech Specs
- Powered through DISH HD Solo receiver (required, not included) at 120 VAC power source
- Easy-grip handle included for effortless carrying
- For stationary use only; must be in fixed position during use
- Receives programming from satellites 110 degrees, 119 degrees, 129 degrees
- Equipped with 1 coax input
- 25' coax cable included
- 16" diameter, 13" tall, 7 lbs
- Mounting Options (not included): TR-1518 adjustable tripod mount, RK-4000 RV roof kit
Note: For use in a commercial truck purchase the Winegard Pathway X1.

About Winegard Winegard Company designs and manufactures the greatest spectrum of world class Terrestrial and Satellite video and data antenna products and accessories for residential and mobile applications. Since its incorporation in 1953, Winegard has designed more than 1,000 antenna models and been granted over 80 U.S. patents. The company's heritage includes recognition by NASA for contributions to the Apollo 11 mission, and the induction of founder John Winegard into the Consumer Electronics Association Hall of Fame. Winegard's superior antenna design and manufacturing facilities total 410,000 sq. ft and include a state of the art testing, validation and measurement center. The company's in-house and vertically integrated capabilities support its accelerated product design and development cycle. UV-protected plastic dome. UV-protected plastic dome.
feature_bullets: DISH Playmaker portable satellite antenna featuring a larger high-strength military grade aluminum alloy reflector for improved signal strength, optional RV roof mount and updated sleek design.
Works exclusively with DISH HD solo satellite receiver technology. Compatible with DISH Pay-As-You-Go, pay only for the months you need, or add to home DISH satellite service

Easy setup portable antenna; powered by single coax connection through dish receiver; easy to use and lightweight RV portable satellite dish. Compatible Satellites - DISH 61.5° (SD/HD) 110° (SD/HD) 119° (SD/HD) 129° (SD/HD)
Satellite dish automatically finds dish HD satellite orbital locations making it easy to watch your favorite TV shows in the RV.
Optional RK-4000 (not included) roof kit allows you to mount the dish playmaker satellite antenna to your RV's roof making it easy to store and always ready to use.

specifications.Cover Included: Winegard Company PL-7000 Dish Playmaker Portable Antenna
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars194 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
